Effect: Absorb Memories.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to all skill checks.
Effect: Absorb Memories.name: Effect: Absorb Memories

Effect: Activate Defenses.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Activate Defenses.name: Effect: Activate Defenses

Effect: Adaptive Strike.description: The creature's melee strikes count either as adamantine, cold iron or silver.
Effect: Adaptive Strike.name: Effect: Adaptive Strike

Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.description: The Alchemical Crossbow deals an additional 1d6 damage of the type dealt by the bomb used.
Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.source: Pathfinder Adventure: The Fall of Plaguestone
Effect: Alchemical Crossbow.name: Effect: Alchemical Crossbow

Effect: Alchemical Strike.description:
Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. The drudge imbues its fist attacks with this damage.

Each hit deals 1d6 points of damage of the same type as that of the bomb loaded into it. Each bomb has enough fluid in it for 10 successful strikes.
Effect: Alchemical Strike.source: Pathfinder Adventure: The Fall of Plaguestone
Effect: Alchemical Strike.name: Effect: Alchemical Strike

Effect: Ancestral Journey.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and all skill checks.
Effect: Ancestral Journey.name: Effect: Ancestral Journey

Effect: Ancestral Response.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.
Effect: Ancestral Response.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
Effect: Ancestral Response.name: Effect: Ancestral Response

Effect: Artificer's Command.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.
Effect: Artificer's Command.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
Effect: Artificer's Command.name: Effect: Artificer's Command

Effect: Aura of Command.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to Will saves.
Effect: Aura of Command.name: Effect: Aura of Command

Effect: Aura of Corruption.description: The creature is treated as if it was a plant for the purposes of any effect that particularly harms or inconveniences plant creatures more than other creatures, but does not gain any benefits of being a plant creature.
Effect: Aura of Corruption.name: Effect: Aura of Corruption

Effect: Aura of Misfortune.description: Living creatures must roll twice on all d20 rolls and use the lower result.
Effect: Aura of Misfortune.name: Effect: Aura of Misfortune

Effect: Barbed Net.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Barbed Net.name: Effect: Barbed Net

Effect: Battle Cry.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Battle Cry.name: Effect: Battle Cry

Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.description: The creature takes a status penalty to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks according to its save result.
Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.name: Effect: Bittersweet Dreams

Effect: Black Cat Curse.description: Effect Mistress Dusklight spews a hatefully uttered curse at one creature within 30 feet that she can see. If the target fails a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save, whenever it attempts an attack roll or saving throw, it must roll twice and use the lower result. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. The curse persists until it is removed or the target succeeds a later saving throw against it. The victim can attempt a new @Check[type:will|dc:32] save once per hour to end the curse.
Effect: Black Cat Curse.source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
Effect: Black Cat Curse.name: Effect: Black Cat Curse

Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.description:
The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against mental effects.

It can't take actions that have the concentrate trait unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:flat|dc:10] check. Failing this check wastes the action.
Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.name: Effect: Blasphemous Utterances

Effect: Blood Frenzy.description: The creature gains temporary hit points and other effects based on the specific creature.
Effect: Blood Frenzy.name: Effect: Blood Frenzy

Effect: Blood Fury.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Blood Fury.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
Effect: Blood Fury.name: Effect: Blood Fury

Effect: Blood Magic.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws.
Effect: Blood Magic.name: Effect: Blood Magic

Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saves.
Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure)

Effect: Blood Soak.description: The creature gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
Effect: Blood Soak.name: Effect: Blood Soak

Effect: Blood Wake.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Athletics checks to Swim.
Effect: Blood Wake.name: Effect: Blood Wake

Effect: Bloodline Magic.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Deception checks.
Effect: Bloodline Magic.name: Effect: Bloodline Magic

Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.name: Effect: Bodyguard's Defense

Effect: Bond in Light.description: The creature glows with bright light in a 20-foot emanation and dim light to 40 feet and has @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing 10}.
Effect: Bond in Light.name: Effect: Bond in Light

Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus

Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.description: The creature gains a +10 status bonus its Speeds.
Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus

Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to AC and saves, reduces its resistances by 2, and gains weakness 2 to good damage.
Effect: Brand of the Impenitent.name: Effect: Brand of the Impenitent

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6 acid damage} with its weapon.
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold damage} with its weapon.
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} with its weapon.
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage} with its weapon.
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative.description: The creature deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} with its weapon.
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative

Effect: Brutal Rally.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Brutal Rally.name: Effect: Brutal Rally

Effect: Call to Action.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Call to Action.name: Effect: Call to Action

Effect: Call to Blood.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.
Effect: Call to Blood.name: Effect: Call to Blood

Effect: Call to Halt (Success).description: The target takes a -10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute.
Effect: Call to Halt (Success).source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
Effect: Call to Halt (Success).name: Effect: Call to Halt (Success)

Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.
Effect: Calming Bioluminescence.name: Effect: Calming Bioluminescence

Effect: Caustic Mucus.description: The creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speed. This Speed reduction ends with the persistent acid damage.
Effect: Caustic Mucus.name: Effect: Caustic Mucus

Effect: Choose Weakness.description:
The Ghaele changes the elemental damage damage dealt by its greatsword and light ray to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

It can also change its energy resistance to any of these energy types (this can be a different type than for its attacks).
Effect: Choose Weakness.name: Effect: Choose Weakness

Effect: Chug.description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks, damage rolls, and saving throws against fear.
Effect: Chug.name: Effect: Chug

Effect: Cite Precedent.description: The creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty on the next Diplomacy check in a legal argument.
Effect: Cite Precedent.name: Effect: Cite Precedent

Effect: Commander's Aura.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.
Effect: Commander's Aura.name: Effect: Commander's Aura

Effect: Countered by Fire.description: The creature takes a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and AC, and its jaws Strike doesn't deal electricity damage.
Effect: Countered by Fire.name: Effect: Countered by Fire

Effect: Countered by Water.description: The creature takes a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, and its jaws Strike doesn't deal fire damage.
Effect: Countered by Water.name: Effect: Countered by Water

Effect: Crocodile Form.description: The bunyip gains a land Speed of 20 feet, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.
Effect: Crocodile Form.name: Effect: Crocodile Form

Effect: Crush of Hundreds.description: The creature takes a -10-foot penalty to all Speeds.
Effect: Crush of Hundreds.source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
Effect: Crush of Hundreds.name: Effect: Crush of Hundreds

Effect: Crushing Spirits.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all its Speeds.
Effect: Crushing Spirits.source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #3-09: The Secluded Siege
Effect: Crushing Spirits.name: Effect: Crushing Spirits

Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.description: The creature gains a fly Speed of 40 feet.
Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.name: Effect: Crystalline Dust Form

Effect: Curse of Stone.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to its AC.
Effect: Curse of Stone.name: Effect: Curse of Stone

Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.description: The creature immediately attempts its next saving throw against a poison with a -2 status penalty.
Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.source: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.name: Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom

Effect: Defensive Assault.description: The creature gains a circumstance bonus to AC based on the weapons used for defense.
Effect: Defensive Assault.name: Effect: Defensive Assault

Effect: Defensive Slam.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Defensive Slam.name: Effect: Defensive Slam

Effect: Devour Soul.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Devour Soul.name: Effect: Devour Soul

Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.description: The creature gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.name: Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or Higher)

Effect: Dire Warning.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.
Effect: Dire Warning.source: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
Effect: Dire Warning.name: Effect: Dire Warning

Effect: Dirty Bomb.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.
Effect: Dirty Bomb.name: Effect: Dirty Bomb

Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).description: The creature takes a -3 circumstance penalty to fortitude saves against the chemist's Crude Bombs.
Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure)

Effect: Distracting Frolic.description: The target ally can roll the save twice and take the better result.
Effect: Distracting Frolic.name: Effect: Distracting Frolic

Effect: Disturbing Vision.description: The visions last [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, and while they do, all evil creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to all checks.
Effect: Disturbing Vision.name: Effect: Disturbing Vision

Effect: Divine Aegis.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects and a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.
Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis

Effect: Ensnare.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed.
Effect: Ensnare.name: Effect: Ensnare

Effect: Entangling Slime.description: The creature takes a -5-foot penalty to Speed.
Effect: Entangling Slime.name: Effect: Entangling Slime

Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC.
Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.name: Effect: Fanatical Frenzy

Effect: Fed by Metal.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to AC.
Effect: Fed by Metal.name: Effect: Fed by Metal

Effect: Fed by Wood.description: The fire damage from the creature's jaws increases by one die.
Effect: Fed by Wood.name: Effect: Fed by Wood

Effect: Feed.description: The creature gains a status bonus to its checks and DCs depending on how often it used the Feed ability.
Effect: Feed.name: Effect: Feed

Effect: Fiddle.description: The creature take a -10-foot status penalty to Speeds.
Effect: Fiddle.name: Effect: Fiddle

Effect: Filth Wave.description: The creature takes a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Filth Wave.name: Effect: Filth Wave

Effect: Focused Assault.description: The creature deals additional damage based on the amount of longswords it wields.
Effect: Focused Assault.name: Effect: Focused Assault

Effect: Fortune's Favor.description: Whenever the creature attempts a specific type of saving throw, it rolls twice and takes the higher result. The type of saving throw is determined by the suit that featured most prominently in the harrow reading: Fortitude (Hammers or Shields), Reflex (Keys or Books), or Will (Stars or Crowns)
Effect: Fortune's Favor.name: Effect: Fortune's Favor

Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.description: The creature gains @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing 5} and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.
Effect: Ghonhatine Feed.name: Effect: Ghonhatine Feed

Effect: Gleaming Armor.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance to energy damage based on the specific creature.
Effect: Gleaming Armor.name: Effect: Gleaming Armor

Effect: Glowing Spores.description: The creature takes a -4 penalty to Stealth checks.
Effect: Glowing Spores.name: Effect: Glowing Spores

Effect: Goblin Song.description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.
Effect: Goblin Song.name: Effect: Goblin Song

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical.name: Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Critical Failure)

Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Perception checks and saves against mental effects.
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure).name: Effect: Hallucinogenic Pollen (Failure)

Effect: Hamstring.description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Hamstring.source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
Effect: Hamstring.name: Effect: Hamstring

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a +1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies).name: Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Allies)

Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).description: The creature gains a -2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a -1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects
Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies).name: Effect: Harmonizing Aura (Enemies)

Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.description: The creature must roll twice and take the lower result on its next roll of a specific type, determined by the card's suit. The suits and their effects are: Hammers (melee attack roll), Keys (Reflex save), Shields (Fortitude save), Books (skill check), Stars (Will save), and Crowns (spell attack roll).
Effect: Harrowing Misfortune.name: Effect: Harrowing Misfortune

Effect: Haywire.description: The creature takes a -1 circumstance penalty to Strikes but deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} plus @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.
Effect: Haywire.source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
Effect: Haywire.name: Effect: Haywire

Effect: Hunted Fear.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Survival checks to avoid getting lost.
Effect: Hunted Fear.name: Effect: Hunted Fear

Effect: Hurl Net.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Hurl Net.name: Effect: Hurl Net

Effect: Hydra Heads.description: The number of heads the hydra currently has.
Effect: Hydra Heads.name: Effect: Hydra Heads

Effect: Hypnotic Stare.description: That target takes a -2 penalty to Will saving throws.
Effect: Hypnotic Stare.name: Effect: Hypnotic Stare

Effect: Infectious Aura.description:
The creature takes a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects.

If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.
Effect: Infectious Aura.name: Effect: Infectious Aura

Effect: Inspirational Presence.description: Any of the teacher's students in the aura gains a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.
Effect: Inspirational Presence.name: Effect: Inspirational Presence

Effect: Inspire Envoy.description: The creature gains a status bonus to attack rolls, AC, or all of the following: Perception, Will saves, and Charisma-based skill checks. The value of the bonus depends on the specific creature granting this effect.
Effect: Inspire Envoy.name: Effect: Inspire Envoy

Effect: Inspired Feast.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.
Effect: Inspired Feast.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
Effect: Inspired Feast.name: Effect: Inspired Feast

Effect: Inspiring Presence.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against fear effects.
Effect: Inspiring Presence.name: Effect: Inspiring Presence

Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Suc.name: Effect: Instinctual Tinker (Critical Success)

Effect: Invigorating Passion.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and 10 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Invigorating Passion.name: Effect: Invigorating Passion

Effect: Kharna's Blessing.source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
Effect: Kharna's Blessing.name: Effect: Kharna's Blessing

Effect: Lantern of Hope.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.
Effect: Lantern of Hope.name: Effect: Lantern of Hope

Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).description: The creature gains a +3 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.
Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).name: Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)

Effect: Lost Red Cap.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to its damage rolls.
Effect: Lost Red Cap.name: Effect: Lost Red Cap

Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).description: The creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot emanation for the duration of the effect.
Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure)

Effect: Mangling Rend.description: The target takes a -20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.
Effect: Mangling Rend.name: Effect: Mangling Rend

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).description: The creature must roll twice and use the lower result on its next d20 roll.
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad).name: Effect: Manipulate Luck (Bad)

Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).description: The affected creature can roll twice on one d20 roll within the next minute and use the higher result.
Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good).name: Effect: Manipulate Luck (Good)

Effect: Moon Frenzy.description: The creature becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2.
Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: Effect: Moon Frenzy

Effect: Mortal Reflection.description: The imperfect automaton draws upon the target's emotions to recall a semblance of mortal feeling, gaining a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed for 1 minute.
Effect: Mortal Reflection.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
Effect: Mortal Reflection.name: Effect: Mortal Reflection

Effect: Motivating Assault.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.
Effect: Motivating Assault.source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #2-12: Snakes in the Grass
Effect: Motivating Assault.name: Effect: Motivating Assault

Effect: Mutilating Bite.description: The creature then takes a -1 status penalty to Charisma-based checks. This penalty is cumulative up to -3.
Effect: Mutilating Bite.name: Effect: Mutilating Bite

Effect: Necrotic Field.description: Undead within the aura deal an additional [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6 negative damage} with their natural attacks.
Effect: Necrotic Field.source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
Effect: Necrotic Field.name: Effect: Necrotic Field

Effect: No Quarter!.description: The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a+1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.
Effect: No Quarter!.name: Effect: No Quarter!

Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.description:
The creature gains a +1 status bonus to all Crafting checks, Performance checks, and Will saves.

Bards receive additional benefits:

  • Enigma Muse: +1 status bonus to all Lore checks (not included)
  • Maestro Muse: +2 status bonus to Performance checks for the purpose of determining the effects of compositions
  • Polymath Muse: +4 status bonus to untrained skill checks
  • Other Muses: +2 status bonus to Will saves against fey
Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration.name: Effect: Nymph Queen's Inspiration

Effect: Overtake Soul.source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
Effect: Overtake Soul.name: Effect: Overtake Soul

Effect: Pain Frenzy.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Pain Frenzy.name: Effect: Pain Frenzy

Effect: Parry Dance.description: The rake gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of their next turn.
Effect: Parry Dance.name: Effect: Parry Dance

Effect: Phalanx Fighter.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Phalanx Fighter.name: Effect: Phalanx Fighter

Effect: Poison Frenzy.description: The poison eater flies into a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. While in a frenzy, the poison eater gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with melee Strikes, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with melee Strikes, gains 20 temporary Hit Points until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC.
Effect: Poison Frenzy.source: Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven
Effect: Poison Frenzy.name: Effect: Poison Frenzy

Effect: Pollution Infusion.source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
Effect: Pollution Infusion.name: Effect: Pollution Infusion

Effect: Praise Adachros.description: The creature gains +1 status bonus to attack rolls, perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.
Effect: Praise Adachros.name: Effect: Praise Adachros

Effect: Profane Gift.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws.
Effect: Profane Gift.name: Effect: Profane Gift

Effect: Protean Anatomy.description: The creature gains resistance to either acid, electricity, or sonic according to its Protean Anatomy.
Effect: Protean Anatomy.name: Effect: Protean Anatomy

Effect: Putrid Blast.description: Creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against xulgath bile for 1 minute.
Effect: Putrid Blast.source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
Effect: Putrid Blast.name: Effect: Putrid Blast

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.description: The creature gains energy damage resistance similar to the triggering type.
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland.name: Effect: Rapid Evolution - Energy Gland

Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.description: The creature gains physical damage resistance similar to the triggering type.
Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk.name: Effect: Rapid Evolution - Husk

Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws.
Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success.name: Effect: Read the Stars (Critical Success)

Effect: Resonance.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for effects with the selected trait; a creature with the elemental and selected traits gains this bonus to all attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Resonance.name: Effect: Resonance

Effect: Revert Form.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.
Effect: Revert Form.name: Effect: Revert Form

Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.description: The affected creature takes a -20-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 2 rounds.
Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #3-10: Delve the Pallid Depths
Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure.name: Effect: Rockfall Critical Failure

Effect: Rockfall Failure.description: The affected creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its movement speeds for 1 round.
Effect: Rockfall Failure.source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #3-10: Delve the Pallid Depths
Effect: Rockfall Failure.name: Effect: Rockfall Failure

Effect: Rope Snare.description: The creature takes a 10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.
Effect: Rope Snare.name: Effect: Rope Snare

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).description: The greatsword gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the greatsword is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword)

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).description: The longspear gains the deadly trait with 3d8, and a creature hit with the longspear is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear)

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).description: The rock gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the rock is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] save.
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock)

Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).description: The greatsword deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.
Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword)

Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).description: The longspear deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.
Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear)

Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).description: The rock deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.
Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock)

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).description: When the greatsword hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword)

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).description: When the longspear hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear)

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).description: When the rock hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock)

Effect: Sandstorm.description: The creature takes a -4 circumstance penalty to Perception checks.
Effect: Sandstorm.name: Effect: Sandstorm

Effect: Shadow Rapier.description: The rake shrouds their sword in negative energy, changing the damage type to negative.
Effect: Shadow Rapier.name: Effect: Shadow Rapier

Effect: Sinful Bite.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Sinful Bite.name: Effect: Sinful Bite

Effect: Sixfold Flurry.description: The creature gains a circumstance bonus to AC based on the Strikes it chose not to take.
Effect: Sixfold Flurry.name: Effect: Sixfold Flurry

Effect: Slime Trap.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Slime Trap.name: Effect: Slime Trap

Effect: Snake Form.description: The bunyip's tail Strike gains reach 10 and @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab}, but it's Jaws Strike looses the persistent bleed damage.
Effect: Snake Form.name: Effect: Snake Form

Effect: Soul Siphon.description: The creature gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Soul Siphon.name: Effect: Soul Siphon

Effect: Splintered Ground.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.
Effect: Splintered Ground.name: Effect: Splintered Ground

Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.description: The creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds.
Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.name: Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Failure)

Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.description: The creature gains weakness to fire 5, and whenever the creature critically fails wth an attack roll with a wielded weapon, it drops the weapon.
Effect: Spray Toxic Oil.name: Effect: Spray Toxic Oil

Effect: Stench.description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease.
Effect: Stench.name: Effect: Stench

Effect: Stick a Fork in It.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Stick a Fork in It.name: Effect: Stick a Fork in It

Effect: Sticky Spores.description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.
Effect: Sticky Spores.name: Effect: Sticky Spores

Effect: Sting of the Lash.source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
Effect: Sting of the Lash.name: Effect: Sting of the Lash

Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.description:
Each ally that hears the call gains a +4 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls, a +2 status bonus to saving throws, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

The effect duration has been set to the average duration for [[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}. Set the duration to the correct value when the effect is added.
Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.source: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.name: Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Tormentor

Effect: Swell.description: The creature grows to Huge size, and its reach increases to 15 feet. It also gains 12 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to bludgeoning, and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls
Effect: Swell.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
Effect: Swell.name: Effect: Swell

Effect: Sylvan Wine.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects.
Effect: Sylvan Wine.name: Effect: Sylvan Wine

Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll).description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering attack roll.
Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll).name: Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll)

Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check).description: The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering skill check.
Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check).name: Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check)

Effect: Take Them Down!.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.
Effect: Take Them Down!.name: Effect: Take Them Down!

Effect: Technology Control.description:
The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its attack rolls and DCs against a creature it would not normally attack.

Note: This effect applies a penalty to all rolls and DCs while active.
Effect: Technology Control.source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #1-24: Lightning Strikes, Stars Fall
Effect: Technology Control.name: Effect: Technology Control

Effect: Timely Advice.description: The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.
Effect: Timely Advice.name: Effect: Timely Advice

Effect: Totems of the Past.description: Any lizardfolk allies in the area are inspired, gaining a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Totems of the Past.name: Effect: Totems of the Past

Effect: Transfer Protection.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against evil creatures.
Effect: Transfer Protection.name: Effect: Transfer Protection

Effect: Uncanny Tinker.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Uncanny Tinker.name: Effect: Uncanny Tinker

Effect: Undead Mastery.description: The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.
Effect: Undead Mastery.name: Effect: Undead Mastery

Effect: Unluck Aura.description: The creature must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks.
Effect: Unluck Aura.name: Effect: Unluck Aura

Effect: Vent Energy.description: The creatures weapon arm strikes deal an extra 2d6 energy damage according to the damage type in the energy gland.
Effect: Vent Energy.name: Effect: Vent Energy

Effect: Void Shroud.description: Living creatures in the emanation take a -2 status penalty to saves against fear and death effects.
Effect: Void Shroud.name: Effect: Void Shroud

Effect: Volcanic Purge.description: The target takes [[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}, and as long as it has this persistent fire damage, it also takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Volcanic Purge.name: Effect: Volcanic Purge

Effect: War Leader.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.
Effect: War Leader.name: Effect: War Leader

Effect: Waterlogged.description: While waterlogged, the berberoka can use Spray Water, their size grows to Gargantuan, and their Speed is reduced to 15 feet.
Effect: Waterlogged.name: Effect: Waterlogged

Effect: Whirlwind Form.description: The creature gains resistance 10 to physical damage.
Effect: Whirlwind Form.name: Effect: Whirlwind Form

Effect: Wolf Shape.description: The barghest gains Speed 40 and its jaws gain @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.
Effect: Wolf Shape.name: Effect: Wolf Shape

Effect: Wrath of Fate.description: An affected creature can choose to roll twice when it attempts an attack, saving throw, or skill check and take the lower result. After this the effect ends.
Effect: Wrath of Fate.name: Effect: Wrath of Fate

Effect: Xulgath Stench.description: The creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Xulgath Stench.name: Effect: Xulgath Stench
